channel.title: Funky Deep Tech House London Underground
channel.description: The Tinker Podcast is a collective of DJs bring you the best in underground dance music around
channel.itunes:author: Jen
channel.itunes:summary: The Tinker Podcast is a collective of DJs bring you the best in underground dance music around

item.title: Tinker Podcast 012 Claudia Lovisa
item.description: Summer has finally arrived and with that in mind, we can proudly present a fantastic set from Claudia Lovisa... Get ready for a spellbound enchanting set from one of ibiza hottest DJs, the mix is bursting with sun laden Deep and Tech House grooves from Claudia Lovisa, tini, Audiofly and Huxley. Tracklisting 01. Audiofly, Robbie & Muan - Watching Ourselves - No19 Music 02. tiNi - Fail Better - Desolat 03. Claudia Lovisa - Nightrider (Tim Green rmx) - Supernature 04. Alex Arnout - Movements in Soul (Laura Jones rmx) - Turquoise Blue Recordings 05. Matt Tolfrey, Kate Simko - Take It Easy - Leftroom 06. Igor The Koi - Yawp! - Yippiee 07. DJT - Leaving' Me feat Khan (Clockwork rmx) - Get Physical 08. Echonomist - Simply Minds - Quantixed Music 09. Jorday Peak - Move With It (Huxley Warehouse Dub) - Klasse Recordings 10. Massimo Cassini - Travian - Recovery Tech 11. Alexis Raphael - Into the Light - Hot Creations 12. Evans & Waterfall - On & On (Huxley Remix) - Roots and Wings Music 13. Two Armadillos - Theme - Two Armadillos Next up on the Tinker Podcast is Paul Willis... Come join our ever growing Facebook community! You will find links to past episodes and the occasional live set plus other bits and bobs relating to the podcast...

item.title: Tinker Podcast 011 Tim B
item.description: Check out the latest mix from Tim B. The mix is full of spills and thrills from the likes of Steve Bug, Simon Baker, Huxley, Dubfire and Radio Slave. The mix kicks off with a few deep house tracks which sets a solid platform for the more upfront tech and techno sounds that follow. The 3 back to back remixes from Carlo Lio are worth teasing your ears for. Tracklisting 01. Lovebirds - The Rrain (Steve Bug Remix) 02. Burnski - Old School Swing 03. Huxley - Feel What You Want 04. Urulu - Dont Care 05. Simon Baker - Too Slow (Radio Slave Panorama Garage Remix) 06. Emanuel Satie - Sill Sayings (Tripmastaz Remix) 07. Piek, Danny Serano - We Feel House Music 08. China and Tom - The Ladies (Carlo Lio Remix) 09. Sinc and Horatio - Ramayana (Carlo Lio Remix) 10. Clio - Do It (Carlo Lio Remix) 11. &ME - Red Flag 12. Radio Slave, Danton Eeprom - Grindhouse (Nic Fanciulli Remix) 13. Dubfire - Rabid 14. Luca Bacchetti - High Life Next up on the Tinker Podcast is the return of Claudia Lovisa Come join our ever growing Facebook community! You will find links to past episodes and the occasional live set plus other bits and bobs relating to the podcast...

item.title: Tinker Podcast 010 Paul Willis
item.description: Our new Tinker Podcast resident Paul Willis takes control this week with a unique blend of tech and deep house. The set features artists such as Slam, Adam Port, Wehbba and Nicole Moudaber to name few. The set covers all forms of house music from up front tech to more laid back deep house to intricate hypnotic techno. Tracklisting 01. Slam - Groovelock (Deepchord Atmospheric Rebuild Mix) 02. Ultrasone - Here And So Far (Original Mix) 03. Dio S - Baby Eyes (Original Mix) 04. Alexis Cabrera - Rain (Original Mix) 05. Philip Arruda - Casanova (Original Mix) 06. Sirenize - Everybody (Original Mix) 07. Adam Port - Sally (Original Mix) 08. Rhadow - Stand For Something (Chase Buch Remix) 09. Paul C, Paolo Martini - Amore (Michel de Hey Remix) 10. Sabb, Bekim - Water Bottle (Original 6AM Mix) 11. Smash TV - Matthew Pervert (Original Mix) 12. Wehbba - Motone (Original Mix) 13. Nicole Moudaber - I Got Cash (Wally Lopez Re-Edit) 14. Claire Ripley, Zeitgeist - The Ace (Original Mix) 15. Beesmunt Soundsystem - All The Way (Original Mix) / Sander Kleinenberg - My Lexicon [loop] 16. Sidney Charles - Sandbox Love (Original Mix) If you got into the groove of this podcast go and visit Paul's Soundcloud page... Paul Willis SoundCloud Thanks for listening and we will be back again next week with some more funky, topsy turvy techy beats. Come join our ever growing Facebook community! You will find links to past episodes and the occasional live set plus other bits and bobs relating to the podcast...

item.title: Tinker Podcast 009 Tinker
item.description: I'm looking forward to sharing this set, Its 65 minutes of underground grooves from Tinker. Not one of her usual sets, its more of chin stroker for the first 35 minutes with tracks from dOP, Audiojack and Pol_on. The mix moves on nicely into some tech and techno towards the end with killer tracks from Paco Osuna, The Junkies, Eats Everything and Ramon Tapia. Enjoy! Lets us know what you think of the podcast via our facebook page or the comments board. Tracklisting 01. Masomenos & dOP - Hello 02. Affkt & dOP - El Flautista (Original Mix) 03. Andrea Oliva & Gel Abril - Scene 04. Pol_on - Chorosc Jesienna 05. Pablo - Turn The Page (Alex Under Remix) 06. Anil Chawla, Dale Anderson - leftorium (Philipp Ort remix) 07. ADM, Simone Cristini, Platt - Tonal (Danny Serrano Mix) 08. Audiojack feat. Kevin Knapp - Stay Glued (FCL weemix) 09. Oliver Klein - Rainstick 10. Paco Osuna - Pum Pum (Original Mix) 11. Oliver Klein & Kolombo - I Know 12. The Junkies - Just Ride (Original Mix) 13. Laura Jones - Love In Me (Eats Everythings Loving youre work) 14. Victor Calderone, Carlos Fauvr - Out There (Paco Osuna Remix) 15. Kabale Und Liebe & Lauhaus - Hiphouse 16. Amir - Pop Shop 17. Ramon Tapia - Day One (Original Mix) Next week we have our new resident podcaster Paul Willis, so keep your ear open for that. Big thanks for to all our listeners, even though with been a little slow in producing show you have all stuck with us :) TB If you enjoyed the podcast please join our facebook page just click the below link. You can subscribe to the tinker podcast via Itunes, which I highly recommend you do.

item.title: Tinker Podcast 008 Tim B
item.description: Hello, It seems like ages since we last posted up a new mix, but we are back again and this time we wont be having any breaks. We have had so many many hiccups over the past few months but now its all good and we are ready to go. We kick off TP008 with some Booty Ghetto Tech from French Fires and Shadow Child both tracks are on Dirty Bird Records. Its always a good way to start a set with some bad ass bass... just to get everyone warmed up! Tracklisting 01. French Fries - Yo Vogue (Claude VonStroke Remix) 02. Shadow Child - Rustic Chid 03. Bushwacka and Just Be - Touch Me (original mix) 04. Karol XVII & MB Valence - Crowded House (Pezzner Remix) 05. Jay Bliss - Strange Faces 06. Chris Minus & Darius Vaikas - Soulshaker 07. Little Fritter and Zare- I Want It Back (Luna City Express Remix) 08. Wollion, Dualton - Foursquare 09. NTFO & DJ Optick - From The Tower (Original Mix 10. Kernel Key - Moonjazzin (Original Mix) 11. Sante feat Soliman - La Pek (Original Mix) 12. Sante - Ce Tout 13. Hector Couto - All You Want (Hermanez Remix) 14. Boris Ross, Jeff Moore - Tap Ya (Gary Beck Remix) 15. Tom Flynn - Opera House (Kaiserdisco Remix) Over April we will be having few guest mixes plus sets from Paul Willis and Tinker. If you enjoyed the podcast please join our facebook page just click the below link. You can subscribe to the tinker podcast via Itunes, which I highly recommend you do.

item.title: Tinker Podcast 007 F.Sonik
item.description: This week we have a 2 Hour Exclusive Mix from F.SONIK, recorded in the legendary club Ambasada Gavioli. This is a quality live mix that showcases F.Sonik skills behind the turn tables. F.Sonik FaceBook Page You can subscribe to the tinker podcast via Itunes, which I highly recommend you do.

item.title: Tinker Podcast 006 Tim B
item.description: This weeks mix has a bit of everything from Deep House to more upfront Techno. The set is a little longer than the standard the 60 minutes! I got bit carried away towards the end with some Messy Jazzy Techy House stuff. Its a fun set with Heavy Drops from Worthy, Paul Ritch, Paco Osuna to name a few. Tracklisting 01. Layo & Bushwacka - Summer Gone 02. Luca Bernardi - Love In Paris 03. David Bocanegra - Hijos De La MMMM (Massimo Girardi & Deltano Remix) 04. Ramiro Lopez - 1975 (Tuccillo and Angel Linde aka Lindillo Remix) 05. Tube & Berger - Envy (Pirupa Remix) 06. Jay Lumen - Tabu 07. Paco Osuna & Daniel Sanchez - Kawuriel 08. Worthy - No Cure 09. Worthy & Yankee Zulu - Digital Aboriginal 10. Paul Ritch, Handycraft and Okain - Fils Du 9 11. Paul Ritch - Bass Trap 12. Paul Ritch - 5 am On The Great Wall 13. Vaggio - U Ready 14. Da Fresh & Michel Spoon - Three Days (Kernel Key Remix) 15. Omid S - Lemba 16. Oliver S - Granulated Soul 17. Pete Bandit & Jason Shae - Tell Me (instrumental mix) 18. Alli Borem - Fantafesta If you own a blog, facebook or twitter page please share this mix and spread the word. TB If you enjoyed the podcast please join our facebook page just click the below link. You can subscribe to the tinker podcast via Itunes, which I highly recommend you do.

item.title: Tinker Podcast 005 Tim B
item.description: Back Again after a few months of being on and off air, but this time round we our here to stay! We kick off 2012 with some booty popping sounding tracks and remixes from J.Philp, Layo & Bushwacka, Hermanez, Eats Everything, Maya Jane Coles, Alex Tepper and Sante. Tracklisting 01. J.Phlip - Big Ass Party Hat 02. Joe Joyce - Amygdala (Maya Jane Coles Remix) 03. Caio Jardini - In The Morning On Amazonia 04. Andy & McKenzie - Auli 05. Layo & Bushwacka - What Do You Say Now 06. Layo & Bushwacka - Artillery (Original Mix) 07. Santos - Newyorkese (Alex Tepper Remix) 08. Anil Chawla - Freak Inn (Original Mix) 09. Hermanez - Camu Flash 10. Eats Everything - The Size (Original Mix) 11. Tripmastaz - House Syndrome 12. DJ Boris - The Drums (DJ Chus Iberican Mix) 13. Jon Rundell - Cant Stop (Original Mix) 14. Danny Serrano and Gonzalo and Gonalez - Sake (Original Mix) 15. Danny Serrano and Hector Couto - You Crazy (Original Mix) 16. Sidney Charles - Big Bada Boom (Sante Remix) 17. Stefano Libelle - Tall Bold Slugger Finally just a quick Thank You to everyone who supported and contributed to the Tinker Podcast last year. TB If you enjoyed the podcast please join our facebook page just click the below link. You can subscribe to the tinker podcast via Itunes, which I highly recommend you do.

item.title: Tinker Podcast 004 Tinker
item.description: We are back with a bang! 16 tracks in total this week with bombs from Santos, Ramon Tapia, 2000 and One and Kaiserdisco to name a few. Thanks to everyone for their support over the past few months hopefully we have our bandwidth issues behind us and we can look forward to lots on new episodes. Tracklisting 01. Gwen Maze, Jef k - Boy Meets Girl (Original Mix) 02. Tripmastaz - House Syndrome 03. Remerc - Vilassar (Ramon Tapia Remix) 04. Supernova - Bangin' (original Spades Mix) 05. Sante meets Alex Tepper - Few Words 06. Ramon Tapia & Sandy Huner - Spiral 07. Hauswerks - Kudu (Original Version) 08. Mon & Nexus DJ - Drunk Panther (Digital Bonus) 09. Santos - Zagros Fest 10. Rober Gaez - Drunkin Preacher (Original Mix) 11. 2000 and One - Inside Job (Original Mix) 12. Mauro Picotto - Radioactivity (Mihalis Safras and Mr. Bizz Remix) 13. Kaiserdisco - Kuala 14. Paco Osuna - New Recipe (Original Mix) 15. Mauro Picotto - Puzzle (Mladen Tomic Remix) 16. Pirupa - Break Mambo (Original Mix) Next week we have Tim B on the podcast. If you enjoyed the podcast please join our facebook page just click the below link. You can subscribe to the tinker podcast via Itunes, which I highly recommend you do.

item.title: Tinker Podcast 003 Delicious
item.description: The Delicious DJs take over this week with a superb tropical tech blend of Latin and Caribbean style rhythms, this sixty minute set also includes the Promo from Delicious 'Coconut'! Tracklisting 01 Chants - Okain Steakhouse Remix - Leix 02 Que Hacer - Danny Serrano - Andre Butano, Miguel Lobo 03 Cubic Sounds - Original Mix - Markus Homm, Philipp Gonzales 04 Basement feat. Daniel Wilde - Original Mix - Adam Port 05 Waking Up - Original Mix - Sinisa Tamamovic 06 Clear Sailing - Original Mix - John Acquaviva, Olivier Giacomotto 07 Children Of Luanda - Original Mix - David Herrero 08 Coconut - Tavo Deep Drums Remix - Delicious 09 Everyday In My Life - Original Mix - DJ Chus, David Herrero 10 No Holding Back - Original Mix - Daniel Dubb 11 All The Girls - Original Mix - Guti 12 Back To Reality - Roberto Palmero (Sisters Remix) - Delicious Delicious Blog, Videos, Pics etc... Delicious Myspace Page Delicious Facebook Fan Page Thanks to Delicious for a wonderful set, i'm up next week so keep it locked until then. Jen x You can subscribe to the tinker podcast via Itunes, which I highly recommend you do.

item.title: Tinker Podcast 002 Reset Robot
item.description: We have a special Reset Robot Showcase this week, packed with lots of secret weapons and exclusive unreleased tracks. There are plenty of highlights in this set especially Bumble a big heavy bass monster of a track. If you're off to Mystery Land in Amsterdam next weekend remember to catch Reset Robot on the Saturday, twanging out his distinctive dubbed, Tech House and Techno! Tracklisting 01. Reset Robot - All That's Ever Been [Alive] 02. Jon Gurd - Atomic State (Reset Robot Remix) [Primal Rhythm] 03. Reset Robot - Troubadours 04. Reset Robot - Animals In A Pot 05. Miss Sunshine - I Don't Really Care (Reset Robot Remix) [Zool] 06. Reset Robot - Purple Shoots 07. Reset Robot - Whispering Voice 08. Reset Robot - Weeds [Form] 09. Gregor Tresher - Sidewinder (Reset Robot Remix) [Drumcode] 10. Reset Robot - Bumble 11. Reset Robot - Izumi [iVav] 12. Reset Robot - Jomo [Truesoul] Reset Robot FaceBook Page Reset Robot Myspace Page Tour Dates Sat 27 Aug Mysterylands, Amsterdam - Holland Sat 29th Oct Hightide, Southampton - UK Thanks to Reset Robot for amazing showcase, up next week we have the Delicious DJs! Come join our facebook page we have a back catalogue of mixes from myself and the other podcast residents plus news on future track releases and tours. You can subscribe to the tinker podcast via Itunes, which I highly recommend you do.

item.title: Tinker Podcast 001 Paul Willis and Tim B
item.description:
We have decided to put some order to our podcast episodes, it was getting a bit confusing having several episodes under the same name, so from now on we will be numbering every episode. We are starting off epiosde 1 with Paul Willis. Paul Willis is a Manchester based DJ with a raw talent to take a dance floor apart. Tracklisting 01. Martinez - Damaged Color (Livio & Roby Remix) 02. Plain Pits - Huma Walalegn 03. Andhim - Orientexpress 04. Adam Port - Basement feat Daniel Wilde (Matthias Tanzmann Remix) 05. Aldo Cadiz - Ripon 06. Coyu and Edu - Imbernon La Coincidencia 07. Plain Pits - Requinto 08. Butch - Reshef (BNZO Remix) 09. Plain Pits - Kinnin 10. Martinez - Memorial (Luna City Express Remix) 11. Bart Skils - Santiago 12. Mladen Tomic - Travelling 13. Nina Kraviz - Pain In The Ass 14. Christian Smith - Cabecudas You can check out more of Paul's mixes at his Soundcloud Page 65 minutes
As a added bonus the second hour is a mix by Tim B, in short its a big Phat Techno affair that tinkers on the boundaries of house. Get your booty down to this! Tracklisting 01. Santos - Sinus Disco 02. Carlo Lio - Finders Keepers 03. Paul Ritch - Kawabanga 04. Fergie - Liquid Brain (Alan Fitzpatrick Remix) 05. Gary Beck - Mock Tease 06. Sante Adam Port - Own (Riva Starr Remix) 07. Antonio De Angelis - Low Deep 08. Marco Effe - Hyden 09. Paco Osuna and Joseph Capriati - Wope 10. Cristian Varela - Space 11. Gary Beck - Diva Big up to Paul for sharing his latest promo with us and next week Reset Robot returns to the Tinker Podast. TB Come join our ever growing Facebook community! You will find links to past episodes and the occasional live set plus other bits and bobs relating to the podcast...

item.title: Tinker Podcast Presents Tinker Deep House Session
item.description: This week we go a little deeper and slower than normal with a 60 minute mix of Deep House grooves. With sundrenched tracks from Luna City Express, DOP, Luca Bacchetti and Homework. Plus my favourite track at the moment by Eats Everything 'Heard That'...the bass in that track takes your breath away. Tracklisting 01. Huxley - Be There (Original Mix) 02. Subb-An and Adam Shelton - Feels So Real (Original Mix) 03. Youandewan - Alone In Berlin 04. DOP - Your Sex 05. Eats Everything - Heard That 06. Veitengruber - Junk 07. Sergio Fernandez - Global Warming (Original Club Mix) 08. Luca Bacchetti - The Endless Summer 09. Simon Baker - Grey Area (Extended mix) 10. Homework - Hold Me Tight (Phil Weeks Remix) 11. Chris Lattner, Luna City Express - Soul on Soul 12. Luna City Express - Celebration of life (Ray Okpara remix) 13. DOP and Seuil - Prostitute (Visionquest Remix) The Delicious Girls have just released a new Track called Coconut, with remixes from DJ Wady and Smilk and Tavo. Check it out on Beatport http://www.beatport.com/release/coconut/402298 See you next week Tinks x Come join our ever growing Facebook community! You will find links to past episodes and the occasional live set plus other bits and bobs relating to the podcast...

item.title: Tinker Podcast Presents Claudia Lovisa
item.description: This week we have the very talented and beautiful Claudia Lovisa on the decks. Claudia has produced a 60 minute master class of deep underground tech tunes with tracks from Audiofly, DOP and Maya Jane Coles to name a few. Claudia is most notably renowned as one half of successful DJ and production duo Amelie, 2010 has seen Claudia making huge waves in her own right, as a solo artist on the international underground music scene. Claudia – who took up permanent residence in Ibiza in 2010 – has spent much of the year locked away in the studio, honing and fine-tuning her undeniably addictive sounds. Sexy, upfront and engaging house packed with solid grooves, standout melodies, and a true underground edge. Her fluid and intriguing sets have resulted in a huge demand for Claudia to perform all around the world, from clandestine underground parties to the world’s best clubs. Standout gigs include the Miami WMC, San Juan Festival at Sonar, Germany’s Love Parade, Rooftop Moscow, Vertigo in Costa Rica, D-Edge in Brazil, Mamitas Beach Club in Playa del Carmen, Gotica in Columbia and Pacha Ibiza. Her mixing skills have enabled her to play along side luminaries like Steve Bug, Audiofly, Konrad Black, Damian Lazarus, Nick Curly and Robert Dietz and in September 2010 she became a resident for the infamous London party Excuse The Mess. She’s come along way since her teenage years, back in her hometown of Durban, South Africa. At the tender age of 15, Claudia – who is also of Italian descent – was first introduced to house music through an older group of friends involved in the local music scene. Her keen passion for vinyl and mixing developed as She spent hours hanging around the DJ booth of her favourite club listening to UK and US house and she was heavily inspired by the infectious sound and attitude of the music. In 2000, the 19-year old packed her bags for London and took her first steps on a dedicated musical career path, quickly scoring a string of residencies and guest slots across London, including clubs like The Cross, The End and numerous other east end parties such as Retox. In 2006 Claudia crossed paths with DJ Sophie Oliver and embarked on a Music Production course at the SAE institute of London and further formed the duo known as Amelie. Claudia soon found her feet as a producer and Amelie were signed to Audiofly’s Supernature Label with their first release in 2008, ‘Under the Radar’, a collaboration with Audiofly. With rave reviews, The girls went on to remix for fellow supernature artists Alex Niggeman, Fabbio Gianelli, Kabuto & Koji and released other remixes and ep’s on labels such as Uberbeat , 1trax and SK Supreme. Their latest release, Seal the Silence EP which came out on Supernature in mid March 2011. Looking forward into 2011, Claudia is focusing on solo projects with her debut EP due to be released in the next few months. Tracklisting 01. Mind on You feat Brenda D - Kate Simko - Hello?Repeat 02. Black Cat - Audiofly - Get Physical 03. Free on the Side - Fabio Gianelli 04. 70th romance - Fabio Gianelli - Maison Detre 05. Colorado - Beep Dee - Hot Waves 06. Silo - Maceo Plex - Crosstown Rebels 07. Time Doesn't Count - Shaun Reeves & Tale of Us rmx - Lowpitch Records 08. Angel (Dyed Soundorom rmx - Inxec - Cityfox 09. Drifted Brain - Fabbio Gianelli - Maison 10. Your Sex (Paul Ritch rmx) - dOP - Supplement Facts 11. No Sympathy - Maya Jane Coles - Elite Records 12. Favourite - Shenoda - Hypercolour 13. Different Morals feat Ali Love - Danny Daze rmx - unknown Gig Dates Sat Afternoon, 15 July - Supernature Showcase @ Hostal Salinas (Ibiza) Sat, 15 July - Blue Marlin (Ibiza) Wed, 20 July - Sankeys Ibiza - Carnival (Ibiza) Sat, 20 August - Excuse The Mess Sunset Boat Cruise (London) Thanks to Claudia for a wonderful set and we will be back next week with another funky deep tech house set. If you're on facebook try out our ilike page... You can subscribe to the tinker podcast via Itunes, which I highly recommend you do.

item.title: Tinker Podcast Presents M.in and Mihalis Safras
item.description: Two Awesome mixes for your ears this week on the Tinker Podcast. Starting off with M.in with a superb blend of house tech and techno, which has been mixed to perfection. M.in Facebook Fan Page M.in Myspace Page Next up is Mihalis Safras who brings down house collective mix of house tracks... The Greek DJ/producer Mihalis Safras has a long history in the electronic music scene of Greece, becoming one of his home country's most celebrated DJs. Over the course of the last decade he has tirelessly established himself as one of the Mediterranean's most promising and hard working artists, appearing on at least a dozen 12 inches last year alone. Through remixes such as his epic reworking of Dubfires anthemic 'Roadkill' Mihalis has developed a proud refined style that is progressive and functional and led to widespread support from the likes of: Sven Vath, Richie Hawtin, Adam Beyer, Ricardo Villalobos. TechHouse can seemingly be said to broadly fall into two categories. There is the type that is all too familiar, and while proving powerful on the dance floor maintains all of the straight lines and heavy structure of traditional techno. There are also the more mature, experimental and creative productions that curiously peer into the creative and exciting unknown. Both in the studio and in the DJ booth Mihalis demonstrates the natural absorbed characteristics of one of the leading underground techno talents. Mihalis Safras Facebook Fan Page Mihalis Safras Myspace Page Once again thanks to Ferdi and Mihalis for two amazing sets and i'll see you all next week with a new set. Tinks x Join are ever growing facebook fanpage just click the link below You can subscribe to the tinker podcast via Itunes, which I highly recommend you do.

item.title: Tinker Podcast Presents Sergio Fernandez
item.description: Second time round on the Tinker Podcast for Sergio Fernandez. This mix is rich in smooth grooves, peak time floor fillers and techy madness. Sergio Fernandez is a multifaceted, Madrid based DJ, producer and events promoter. He started mixing from an early age in small, local clubs and little by little, he realised his calling could convert itself into a career. Tracklisting 01. Rob Mirage – Organico (Original Mix) Stereo 02. Filthy Rich – I need you (Superskank Remix) 303Lovers 03. Jon Flores, David Rodriguez – Moovin 2011 (Original Mix) Undercool Productions 04. Sergio Fernandez, Mark Reeve – Xybots (Original Mix) Insert Coin 05. Luca M – Old Times (Original Mix) Southpark Records 06. Jetro – Rely on you (Original Mix) Urbana 07. Topspin, Dmit Kitz – Elvis House (Simone Vitullo Remix) Formula Records 08. J-Valencia, Johan Dresser – Double J (Original Mix) Portland Records 09. Gerd – Arkest´s Blaze (Original mix) Music Man (classic tune) 10. Sergio Fernandez – Titan (Original Mix) Monique Musique thanks to Sergio for a perfect party mix and i'll see you next week with two mixes from M.in and Mihalis Safras. item.dc:creator: Jen
item.itunes:summary:
Second time round on the Tinker Podcast for Sergio Fernandez. This mix is rich in smooth grooves, peak time floor fillers and techy madness.
Sergio Fernandez is a multifaceted, Madrid based DJ, producer and events promoter. He started mixing from an early age in small, local clubs and little by little, he realised his calling could convert itself into a career.
Tracklisting
01. Rob Mirage – Organico (Original Mix) Stereo 02. Filthy Rich – I need you (Superskank Remix) 303Lovers 03. Jon Flores, David Rodriguez – Moovin 2011 (Original Mix) Undercool Productions 04. Sergio Fernandez, Mark Reeve – Xybots (Original Mix) Insert Coin 05. Luca M – Old Times (Original Mix) Southpark Records 06. Jetro – Rely on you (Original Mix) Urbana 07. Topspin, Dmit Kitz – Elvis House (Simone Vitullo Remix) Formula Records 08. J-Valencia, Johan Dresser – Double J (Original Mix) Portland Records 09. Gerd – Arkest´s Blaze (Original mix) Music Man (classic tune) 10. Sergio Fernandez – Titan (Original Mix) Monique Musique
thanks to Sergio for a perfect party mix and i'll see you next week with two mixes from M.in and Mihalis Safras.

item.title: Tinker Podcast Presents Tim B.
item.description: Manchester based DJ Tim B sets us up this week with a fresh new mix of sorted house tunes. A fantastic set that just keeps building from track to track. With new records from Kaiserdisco, Gary Beck, D.Ramirez, F. Sonik and Andrew Technique this is a set that is worth keeping on your ipod! Tracklisting 01. Nikola Gala - Oasy 02. Gary Beck - Hands In Mine (Original Mix) 03. Danny Serrano, Gonzalez, Gonzalo - That Swing (Original Mix) 04. Kaiserdisco - Lurin 05. Kaiserdisco - Callao 06. F. Sonik & Andrew Technique - Mr. Rich (Original Mix) 07. Oscar De Rivera, Ismael Rivas (aka Riva) - Ritmo Inferno 08. D.Ramirez - Jump It Up (Original Club Mix) 09. Mr. Bizz - Paquita 10. Ron Costa - Housey Marmite (Original mix) 11. Roberto Palmero - So Well (Farshad Remix) 12. D.Ramirez and Kristoph - Shrimp Paste (Original Club Mix) 13. DJ Tonio - Get The Funk (Oliver Giacomotto remix) 14. Santos - Senior Scream 15. Santos - Unstable Freak 16. Slok - Roccos Hard Scene (Hermanez Remix) We are in the process organizing some new guest mixes which we will be airing over coming weeks plus we have Exclusive mixes from our resident DJs Delicious, Reset Robot, M.in and Carlos Casanova coming up in May and June. item.title: Tinker Podcast Presents Tinker Spring 2011
item.description: Its about 12 months since my last Spring Mix so here we go again with another bombardment of what is rocking my boat at the moment. Hopefully this little 60 minute mix will get you into the summer vibe. The set is filled with floor fillers from Paul Ritch, Wally Lopez, Richard Dinsdale and Jon Rundell to name a few. I also dive into some oldish favourites from last year just to mix it up a bit! Tracklisting 01. Move d - Things Will Come... (...For Those Who Wait) 02. Dynamik Dave, Sexy House Lab - La Amazonia (Cuartero Remix) 03. Hermanez - Go Get It 04. Paul C - Brancaia 05. Jon Rundell - Thugs (Original Mix) 06. Jon Rundell - Jack Me (Original Mix) 07. Filthy Rich - Revival (Original Club Mix) 08. Wally Lopez and Richard Dinsdale - Shamba (Sidebum and Redondo Remix) 09. DJ PP - Miami Vice (Hector Couto Remix) 10. Marion D - Trust The Drum (Main Mix) 11. DJ PP - Miami Vice (Original Mix) 12. Criss Source - Saxphunk (Lutzenkirchen Remix) 13. Reboot - Enjoy The Music (Riva Starr Tool) 14. Nicole Moudaber - L'Amour Tropique 15. Paul Ritch - Common Sense 16. Marco Effe - Hyden 17. Oscar L - Umayah (Original Mix) 18. Luca Bear - Luv and Love Thanks for listing and i will catch you next week with another episode. Tinks x Come join our facebook page we have a back catalogue of mixes from myself and the other podcast residents plus news on future track releases, mixes and tours. You can subscribe to the tinker podcast via Itunes, which I highly recommend you do.
